sentences.en: I'm being very naughty—I've ordered champagne!
sentences.cn: 我今天放肆一回—我要了香槟了！

sentences.en: I've even seen her shake Zara when she's been naughty.
sentences.cn: 我甚至见过她在扎拉淘气的时候使劲摇晃她。

sentences.en: If you are naughty you won't get any ice cream.
sentences.cn: 你要是再调皮,就吃不到冰淇淋了.

sentences.en: It is naughty of you to pull the cat's tail.
sentences.cn: 你真淘气,竟然拉猫尾巴.

sentences.en: It is naughty of you to pull your baby sister's hair.
sentences.cn: 你拉你小妹妹的头发真是顽皮.

sentences.en: It was naughty of you to pull the cat's tail.
sentences.cn: 你拉猫的尾巴太顽皮了.

sentences.en: The naughty boy left the classroom on the plea of a headache.
sentences.cn: 那淘气的男孩借口头疼,离开了教室.

sentences.en: The naughty children had run a mile when their teacher arrived.
sentences.cn: 老师来的时候,那些顽皮的孩子都溜掉了.

sentences.en: The teacher kept the student in because he was naughty.
sentences.cn: 那个学生因为顽皮放学后被老师留在学校里.

sentences.en: You know what little boys are like with naughty words.
sentences.cn: 你知道小男孩们说下流话是什么样子。

sentences.en: You naughty boy, stop pulling the cat's tail.
sentences.cn: 你这个淘气鬼, 别拉猫的尾巴了.

sentences.en: You naughty boy, you gave me such a fright.
sentences.cn: 你这调皮鬼，吓了我一跳。

sentences.en: You ought to be stricter with him. He's very naughty.
sentences.cn: 你对他应更严格, 他太淘了.

sentences.en: You really deserve a good beating, you naughty boy.
sentences.cn: 你这个调皮孩子真该打.

sentences.en: You’re a very naughty boy! Look what you’ve done!
sentences.cn: 你真是个淘气鬼！瞧你干了些什么！

trans.tran_cn: 顽皮的，不听话的，粗俗的
trans.tran_en: a naughty child does not obey adults and behaves badly
